# init(userRecordID:)

**Initializer**

Creates a lookup info for the specified user record ID.

## Declaration

```swift
init(userRecordID: CKRecord.ID)
```

## Parameters

- **userRecordID**: The user record ID for looking up the user identity.

## Discussion

After you create a lookup info, use the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDiscoverUserIdentitiesOperation] operation or the  [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchShareParticipantsOperation] operation to retrieve the corresponding user identity.

## Creating a Lookup Info

- **init(emailAddress:)**: Creates a lookup info for the specified email address.
- **init(phoneNumber:)**: Creates a lookup info for the specified phone number.
